name: Pulp Finale
description:
NOTE: Windows / Firefox recommended. Chrome blurs the text. Downloadable Windows version at the bottom of the page and is the preferred way to play (fullscreen).

~

Rasheer leapt down into the cave. A mortal man no longer, his eyes shone with the wrath of divinity...

Malak has been working on her novel, "Ein Iblees", for almost a year.  She is writing  the final battle between the hero, noble Rasheer, and his mortal foe, the titular Eye of The Devil...

There's only one problem - she can't decide on a weapon that Rasheer will use.

~

Fight the Eye of The Devil using 9 different weapons. 1 shot is all you have, but one shot is enough to kill Ein Iblees. Will you create the perfect conclusion to Malak's novel? Or will she change her mind and give you a new weapon to use?

CONTROLS:

1) ARROW BUTTONS: Move, jump, drop from platforms.

2) X: Use weapon.

3) C/ENTER/SPACE: Advance text.

4) + / - / M: Control the volume.

~

Made in 72 hours for Game Zanga 10.
